text: Ezɨ Apolos Akaian mangasava amima, Efesusɨn itir Kraisɨn adarazi, gavgavim a ganɨdi, egha a iniasava Akaian suren gumaziba bagha akɨnafarim osiri. Dughiar kam Apolos Akaian otogha, egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir darasi akurvazir ekiam me gami. God men apangkuvifi, kamaghɨn amizɨ me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn iti.
